events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car with another vehicle at an intersection on April 30th. The claim was officially filed today.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident following the description of the vehicle collision and damages reported.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims was assigned to handle and follow up on the customer's case promptly.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and providing next steps for document submission.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates for further processing.
The customer submitted all requested documents including photos of the car damage, police report, and repair shop estimates.
The investigation into the details of the accident and verification of submitted documents has officially commenced today.
Investigation concluded successfully, confirming the circumstances of the car collision and validity of the submitted documents.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering the repair costs and vehicle loss as per the policy terms.
The customer responded with gratitude and accepted the proposed settlement offer, expressing satisfaction with the service.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company following acceptance of settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for the approved claim was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account without delays.
The claim was officially closed after the successful settlement payment and confirmation from the customer.
All claim documents and case files were archived in the system for future reference and compliance purposes.
